name: Nigralbus
description:
This game is a participation in the 1-Bit B&W Jam.

Everything except some art was made by me, and the biggest focus was on the tehnical stuff... Since there was only 6 days when i started participating in this jam, the game might seem a bit rushed. But i have big plans for it in the future! The main theme is using hacking as a weapon and defense. There are 3 buttons (tablet's VOLUME UP, VOLUME DOWN, POWER) that you can bind any command to. Use The mouse clicks to activate these commands!

This game is a great way to learn way to learn some hacking. :)

Story: 

You're locked in a prison, judged for hacking. Your terminal tablet was smuggled in by cake.  You'll have to hack your way out of prison by following the tutorial!

Future Plans:

Freeroam Mode with Missions after prison!

Custom programming language?

Contribute:

Pixel artists desperately needed!
